pkgmetadata.longdescription: Outlier Diagnostics for Some Linear Effects and Linear Mixed Effects Models // Identifies potential data outliers and their impact on estimates and analyses. Uses the forward search approach of Atkinson and Riani, "Robust Diagnostic Regression Analysis", 2000,ISBN: o-387-95017-6) to prepare descriptive statistics of a dataset that is to be analyzed by stats::lm(), stats::glm(), or nlme::lme(). Includes graphics functions to display the descriptive statistics.
